title: Episode 34 - Soviet Gulag
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we discuss the infamous Soviet Gulag system.  Did they serve a useful purpose?  How harsh were the conditions?  Why did they form in the first place?  How do the Gulags compare to modern prison systems?  We will answer these questions and more.
